question: Which of the following pair is INCORRECT? I.Parsec - Distance II.Barrel - Liquid III.Light year - Time
explanation: The parsec is a unit of length used to measure large distances to astronomical objects outside the Solar System. A barrel is one of several units of volume applied in various contexts; there are dry barrels, fluid barrels oil barrels and so on. The light-year is a unit of length used to express astronomical distances and measures about 9.46 trillion kilometres or 5.88 trillion miles.
